table.caption: Table 57 – Graphics State Operators
head: Operands
Operator
Description
rows: Save the current graphics state on the graphics state stack.
Restore the graphics state by removing the most recently saved state from the stack and making it the current state.
a b c d e f
Modify the current transformation matrix (CTM) by concatenating the specified matrix. Although the operands specify a matrix, they is written as six separate numbers, not as an array.
Set the line width in the graphics state.
Set the line cap style in the graphics state.
Set the line join style in the graphics state.
Set the miter limit in the graphics state.
Set the line dash pattern in the graphics state.
(PDF 1.1) Set the colour rendering intent in the graphics state.
Set the flatness tolerance in the graphics state. flatness is a number in the range 0 to 100; a value of 0 shall specify the output device’s default flatness tolerance.
(PDF 1.2) Set the specified parameters in the graphics state. dictName is the name of a graphics state parameter dictionary in the ExtGState subdictionary of the current resource dictionary.
